about_the_game:
Travelers journey to the town of Melodiena to partake in the Trial of Revere. Those who successfully traverse through the Core labyrinth underneath the town shall be granted the coveted Revere License to operate a guild.

For best compatibility on Steam Deck: Go to Settings (gear icon) > Properties... > Compatibility > turn on forced compatibility > select Proton 7.0-6

KEY FEATURES

  • Build Your Party

    Choose from 15 classes such as: Miko to exploit enemy weaknesses with various elemental spells, Shinobi to pick off weakened foes with finishing moves, and Blesser to support allies with healing abilities. See: Class Guide

  • Customize Skill Sets

    Level up through battles for skill points to unlock new skills and passives for characters.

  • Explore Various Mazes

    Be prepared to navigate treacherous and monster-filled environments filled with items and equipment treasures.

  • Engage in Strategic Combat

    Exploit foes' weaknesses and use status effects as well as de/buffs to survive the labyrinths.

Travelers journey to the town of Melodiena to partake in the Trial of Revere. Those who successfully traverse through the Core labyrinth underneath the town shall be granted the coveted Revere License to operate a guild.

For best compatibility on Steam Deck: Go to Settings (gear icon) > Properties... > Compatibility > turn on forced compatibility > select Proton 7.0-6

KEY FEATURES

  • Build Your Party

    Choose from 15 classes such as: Miko to exploit enemy weaknesses with various elemental spells, Shinobi to pick off weakened foes with finishing moves, and Blesser to support allies with healing abilities. See: Class Guide

  • Customize Skill Sets

    Level up through battles for skill points to unlock new skills and passives for characters.

  • Explore Various Mazes

    Be prepared to navigate treacherous and monster-filled environments filled with items and equipment treasures.

  • Engage in Strategic Combat

    Exploit foes' weaknesses and use status effects as well as de/buffs to survive the labyrinths.
name: Core Crossing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: First-person dungeon crawler RPG. Build your party and explore the labyrinth known as the "Core" under the Town of Melodiena. Successful adventurers shall be granted the town's coveted Revere License.
